title: Car Mechanic Simulator v1.5.1 (Mod Money) APK [SadeemPC]
description:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 v1.5.1 (Mod Money)
Requirements: Android 2.3+

Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 for Android.


Now you can feel how it is to be a car mechanic with PlayWay's Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 Mobile:
- Collect experience points and prestige
- Buy licenses for new cars
- Invest in training agents and advertising
- Upgrade your workshop
- Upgrade owned tools and equipment
- Choose the most interesting from among many available jobs
- Replace or repair faulty parts
- Plan purchases of spare parts
- Complete special tasks
- Collect awards

Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 is a must have for auto mechanics and fans of the world's most popular autos!

The game features:
- 4 different cars 
- 3 different works shops
- Nearly 80 different car parts 
- More than 50 types of defects reported by customers
- Unlimited count of ordered services
- Unlimited count of special tasks

Homepage 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.playway.cms2014
